name: Battle Royale Tanks
description:
BattleRoyale

You are the blue tank. Use ASDW to move and SpaceBar to fire

First to win 3 rounds wins the game!

Used a Unity tutorial template and added extras

Scriptable objects used to program the with AI, destruction, and some of the audio

The core actions are attack, chase, patrol, retreat, and spin attack

The core decisions for these are ActiveStateDecision, Look, Scan

The complexity of states and state controllers use these with different combinations of transitions

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/evolution-epic-nature
